author: vmassol
msg: - Added new Cactus TestCase SPI: runBareServer(). Executed on the server side to start the test.
- Removed the need for a isServerSide() method in Cactus TestCase. WebTestCallers now use the new runBarServer() instead

author: vmassol
msg: Tried to remove dependency on commons-httpclient in server-side code. Thanks to Kazuhito SUGURI [suguri.kazuhito@lab.ntt.co.jp]

author: cmlenz
msg: Update versions of AspectJ and HttpClient to match those in build.properties.sample
(Yes I've used Maven, but only for the JAR downloading part ;-) )

author: cmlenz
msg: Make Log4J optional, as it's only used for logging in the tests
